network
Interface NetListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharConnector, NetWorld
public interface NetListener

Interface that is used for classes that want to receive network packets.

                              int port,
                              int key)
Connect to game server - packed 0x8C
Parameters:
server - New server to connect to.
port - Port to connect to.
key - New encryption key.

receivedGameServerList

public void receivedGameServerList(int flag,
                                   NetGameServerList[] servers)
A packed 0xA8 has been received, telling about the game servers
Parameters:
flag - The flag that has been received.
servers - The list of the game servers received.

public void recvStatWindow(int creatureId,

                           int curMana,
                           int maxMana,
                           int gold,
                           int armorClass,
                           int weight)
Received a stat window creature. (0x11 packet)
Parameters:
playername - the players name
curHp - current hit points
maxHp - maximal hit points
flag - ???
sex - 0..male 1..female
str - strength
dex - dexterenty
intl - inteligence
curStm - current stamina
maxStm - maximum stamina
curMana - current mana
maxMana - maximum mana
gold - gold on player
armorClass - armor class
weight - weight of player
